00029 #ifndef _AP4_SAMPLE_H_
00030 #define _AP4_SAMPLE_H_
00031 
00032 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 |   includes
00034 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00035 #include "Ap4Types.h"
00036 
00037 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 |   class references
00039 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00040 class AP4_ByteStream;
00041 class AP4_DataBuffer;
00042 
00043 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 |   AP4_Sample DO NOT DERIVE FROM THIS CLASS
00045 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 class AP4_Sample 
00047 {
00048 public:
00049     // constructors and destructor
00050     AP4_Sample();
00051     AP4_Sample(const AP4_Sample& other);
00052     AP4_Sample(AP4_ByteStream& data_stream,
00053                AP4_Position    offset,
00054                AP4_Size        size,
00055                AP4_Ordinal     description_index,
00056                AP4_TimeStamp   dts,
00057                AP4_UI32        cts_offset = 0,
00058                bool            sync_flag = true);
00059     ~AP4_Sample(); // not virtual on purpose: do not derive from it
00060 
00061     // operators
00062     AP4_Sample&     operator=(const AP4_Sample& other);
00063 
00064     // methods
00065     AP4_Result      ReadData(AP4_DataBuffer& data);
00066     AP4_Result      ReadData(AP4_DataBuffer& data, 
00067                              AP4_Size        size, 
00068                              AP4_Size        offset = 0);
00069 
00070     // sample properties accessors
00071     AP4_ByteStream* GetDataStream();
00072     void            SetDataStream(AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00073     AP4_Position    GetOffset() const { return m_Offset; }
00074     void            SetOffset(AP4_Position offset) { m_Offset = offset; }
00075     AP4_Size        GetSize() { return m_Size; }
00076     void            SetSize(AP4_Size size) { m_Size = size; }
00077     AP4_Ordinal     GetDescriptionIndex() const { return m_DescriptionIndex; }
00078     void            SetDescriptionIndex(AP4_Ordinal index) { m_DescriptionIndex = index; }
00079     AP4_TimeStamp   GetDts() const { return m_Dts; }
00080     void            SetDts(AP4_TimeStamp dts) { m_Dts = dts; }
00081     AP4_TimeStamp   GetCts() const { return m_Cts; }
00082     void            SetCts(AP4_TimeStamp cts) { m_Cts = cts; }
00083     bool            IsSync() const { return m_IsSync; }
00084     void            SetSync(bool is_sync) { m_IsSync = is_sync; }
00085 
00086 protected:
00087     AP4_ByteStream* m_DataStream;
00088     AP4_Position    m_Offset;
00089     AP4_Size        m_Size;
00090     AP4_Ordinal     m_DescriptionIndex;
00091     AP4_TimeStamp   m_Dts;
00092     AP4_TimeStamp   m_Cts;
00093     bool            m_IsSync;
00094 };
